content: If you're looking for a trail to hike for a whole day, then the "Sentier des Gorges de l'Ardèche" would be a great choice. It is a long trail that follows the Ardèche river and offers incredible views of the canyon. This hike can take 5-7 hours, depending on your pace, and covers a distance of around 16km. You'll experience the beauty of the river while traversing a variety of terrains such as trails, stone steps, rocky cliffs, and sandy beaches. It is considered one of the most challenging and rewarding hikes in the region, perfect for the adventurous hiker seeking a challenge.
